channel.title: Rs Classic autofighter
channel.description:
I was just wondering if anyone could make me a classic autofighter. doesnt have to be anything complex, just need it for fighting cows..
ive searched for a couple days now with no luck, and tried to learn the code.. i give up haha.
would be much appreciated :)

item.title: Rs Classic autofighter
item.dc:creator: @oldy oldy
item.description:
@oldy wrote:

Awesome replies guys. All are very helpful

Read full topic

item.title: Rs Classic autofighter
item.dc:creator: @CDR CDR
item.description:
@CDR wrote:

program Fighter; {.include SRL/SRL.scar} const delay = 300; Monster1 = 9666382;///monster colors Monster2 = 9666382;/// var X, Y : integer; procedure fight; begin If(findcolor(x, y, Monster1, 0, 0, 600, 600))or (findcolor(x, y, Monster2, 0, 0, 600, 600))then Mouse(x,y,2,2,true); wait(300); end; begin SetupSRL; repeat wait(delay+random(500)); fight; until(false) end.

Heres something I made :D… Its nothing special but try this out… kinda one of my first scripts.

Read full topic

item.title: Rs Classic autofighter
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

[quote=“Greg the Xeno, post:2, topic:297540”]It’s very ugly and does not follow the standards, but it works. Tested on World 1 on RS Classic.
Make sure you have SRL, though i one use one SRL procedure lol…

[code]
program CowFighter;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
var x,y: Integer;
Procedure FindCows;
begin
if not(findColor(x,y, 8948106, 6, 67, 503, 351))and
not(findColorTolerance(x,y, 9900, 11, 61, 169, 131, 30))then
begin
repeat
KeyDown(VK_LEFT);
Wait(50+random(50));
KeyUp(VK_LEFT);
until (findColor(x, y, 8948106, 6, 67, 503, 351))
end;
end;

Procedure AttackCow;
begin
if(findColor(x,y, 8948106, 6, 147, 503, 351))or
(findColor(x,y, 8948106, 191, 64, 503, 351))then
begin
Mouse(x, y, 5, 5, true);
end;
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
Wait(100+random(100));
FindCows;
AttackCow;
until false;
end.
[/code][/quote]
That will get you banned so easily…

Read full topic

item.title: Rs Classic autofighter
item.dc:creator: @Greg_the_Xeno Greg the Xeno
item.description:
@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

It’s very ugly and does not follow the standards, but it works. Tested on World 1 on RS Classic.
Make sure you have SRL, though i one use one SRL procedure lol…

program CowFighter;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
  var x,y: Integer;
Procedure FindCows;
 begin
  if not(findColor(x,y, 8948106, 6, 67, 503, 351))and 
  not(findColorTolerance(x,y, 9900, 11, 61, 169, 131, 30))then
   begin
    repeat
     KeyDown(VK_LEFT);
     Wait(50+random(50));
     KeyUp(VK_LEFT);
    until (findColor(x, y, 8948106, 6, 67, 503, 351))
   end;
 end;
 
Procedure AttackCow;
 begin
  if(findColor(x,y, 8948106, 6, 147, 503, 351))or
  (findColor(x,y, 8948106, 191, 64, 503, 351))then
   begin
    Mouse(x, y, 5, 5, true);
   end;
 end;



begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
Wait(100+random(100));
FindCows;
AttackCow;
until false;
end.

Read full topic
